column2: A Writ of Certiorari to quash the decision in ‘P8’ to appoint the 5th Respondent
to conduct an inquiry against the Petitioner;
A Writ of Certiorari to quash the charge sheet ‘P10’;
A  Writ  of  Prohibition  preventing  the  1st  –  7th  Respondents  from  taking  any
A Writ of Prohibition preventing the 6th Respondent from exercising any powers
and  performing  any  duties  of  the  Chairman  of  the  7th  Respondent  Urban
